item.title: AI is only as powerful as the language it understands
item.description: You cannot evolve faster than your language because the language defines the culture of meaning ~ Terrence McKenna There are theories out there which state that the world out there is completely different from the one we perceive. Much like a “dream world” which correlates with the real world as mentioned by Joshua Bach in one of his appearances in the Lex Fridman Podcast. We can look at our perception as a compression algorithm which gives us just enough information about the world to do the things we do.
